name: deFROST (Avixus)
description:
Team Name:

Ember And Ashes

Gameplay Instructions:

Supports both keyboard and controller. Use WASD to move using a keyboard, or the left thumb-stick to move using a controller. Use the mouse or left thumb-stick to navigate menus, and use A to make a selection if using a controller.

Heat up platforms to activate them, and use activated platforms or other sources of heat to recharge. Melt snow and follow the paths to find your way to all the platforms.

Game Content:

All game content was made during the 2020 Unreal Spring Jam time frame, no pre-made assets were used besides the Unreal Rolling template.
